text: The Lake of Thinking (, translit. I limni ton pothon, also known as The Lagoon of Desire) is a 1958 Greek drama movie directed by Giorgos Zervos and starring Tzeni Karezi, Giorgos Fountas, Eleni Zafeiriou, Koula Agagiotou, Christoforos Nezer. ==Other websites== * Category:1958 drama movies Category:Greek movies
title: The Lake of Thinking
